---
title: Freighter Wallet
hide_table_of_contents: true
sidebar_class_name: sidebar-category-items-hidden
sidebar_position: 70
---

[Freighter](https://www.freighter.app/) is a self-hosted wallet provided by the Stellar Development Foundation, available as a mobile application and a browser extension. It provides users a way to interact with Soroban and classic tokens directly from their phone or web browser.
